## Basic API Call

Build a function that takes an email adress, calls the [HaveIBeenPwned API](https://haveibeenpwned.com/), check if the status code is 200, and if it is, returns the results. 

Note: if the email is not in the database, the API returns a 404. 

``` r
haveibeen(pwned = "example@gmail.com")
```


### Package

Create one or more package(s) around these API (or another if you're inspired):

+ [The Cat API](https://thecatapi.com/)

+ [HTTP cat](https://http.cat/)

+ [Chuck Norris Fact](https://api.chucknorris.io/)

+ [International Space Station Current Location](http://open-notify.org)

+ [Musixmatch](https://developer.musixmatch.com/documentation)

+ [The Numbers API](http://numbersapi.com)

+ [Fun Translations API](https://funtranslations.com/api)

+ [REST COUNTRIES](https://restcountries.eu/)

+ [marvel.com](https://developer.marvel.com/)
